adjudicate.translation[0].definitions[0]: to officially decide who is right in a disagreement and decide what should be done
The Dean adjudicates any faculty disputes.
The owner can appeal to the court to adjudicate on the matter.
The judge adjudicated that he should be released.
adjudicate.translation[0].definitions[1]: to be the judge in a competition
He adjudicated at all the regional music competitions.
adjudicate.translation[1].definitions[0]: to officially decide who is right in an argument between two groups or organizations
The union has offered to adjudicate the claim.
The court refused to adjudicate on the issue until all construction activities on the disputed site had ceased.
adjudicate.translation[1].definitions[1]: to be judged by a court of law to be unable to pay debts
